sentences.sContent: He regarded the universe as a cryptogram set by the Almighty—just as he himself wrapt the discovery of the calculus in cryptogram when he communicated with Leibnitz.
sentences.sContent_eng: He regarded the universe as a cryptogram set by the Almighty—just as he himself wrapt the discovery of the calculus in cryptogram when he communicated with Leibnitz.
sentences.sCn: 他将宇宙视为上帝用密文书写的文件——恰如他与莱布尼兹通信时，把自己关于微积分的发现用一种加密的方式书写一样。

sentences.sContent: Cipher Card can offer cryptogram service to PC system and network security device to realize safe storage for files and secure communication for information on network.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cipher Card can offer cryptogram service to PC system and network security device to realize safe storage for files and secure communication for information on network.
sentences.sCn: 加密卡可以为个人计算机系统、网络安全设备提供密码服务，以实现数据的安全存储和网络信息的保密通信。

words.tran: 关于暗号的，用密码写的
译解密码者；担任密码者
[军][通信] 密码学；密码术；隐语
